pr_title: Fix misleading error 'empty body' for responses with a body that could not be decoded.

timeline.message: Fix misleading error 'empty body' for reponses with a body that could not be decoded. Fixes #4613
Look for the bytes in the response to determine if a body was sent. Fix tests
Set the body bytes even if there is no media type to handle the response

timeline.author: graemerocher
